name: The Question: An Interlude
description:
After Hamza's revelation in The Question, a slightly panicked Carrie messages an old friend for some advice.

A text-based game about coming out and the weight of responsibility it brings.

Click anywhere on the page to progress. Full screen recommended.

_____________________________

This game is an interlude and direct sequel to The Question that relies on a familiarity with its plot. It does, however, recap the key relevant action from the game, so if you haven't played the original or have forgotten the details, you will probably be able to understand it.

_____________________________

Game written and coded in Twine by yours truly. Thanks to Kalina for the calculus help and to the Harlowe NeoCities page for helping me figure out how to code this game last minute.

Much love and appreciation to the wonderful commenters who so warmly received the first game; you're the reason this interlude exists!
